page.title: 19My old school
page.content: The school I used to go to in Raskelf opened in 1894 and closed in 1982. The population got smaller and smaller. On the last day there were only 18 children there.When it opened there were only 6, but after 12 years over 300 were going.The school log book has stories of 10 year olds working in brickyards and the master sending children home to bring their money to pay for schooling.There were 2 cloakrooms, 2 schoolrooms, a kitchen and a pantry.It is now used as a gym club and a meeting place for the parish council.This school used to belong to the parish church. When anyone left they were presented with a copy of the Bible.
